tags.name: Periodic payment initiation and information
tags.description: Set of endpoints used for periodic payment initiation and information

post.description: Creates single periodic SEPA payment initiation request

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Access token issued by the authorization server

parameters.name: PSU-Corporate-ID
parameters.description: PSU personal ID code/Company's registration code (for validation purpose)

get.description: Returns details of specified periodic payment

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Access token issued by the authorization server

delete.description: Cancels not yet signed specified periodic payment

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Access token issued by the authorization server

get.description: Returns status of specified periodic payment

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Access token issued by the authorization server

remittanceInformationUnstructured.description: Unstructured payment details (mandatory field for LV either structured or unstructured)

startDate.description: The first applicable day of execution starting from this date is the first payment (ISO-date)

endDate.description: The last applicable day of execution If not given, it is an infinite standing order (ISO-date)

frequency.description: The frequency of the recurring payment resulting from this standing order

name.description: User defined name for the standing order

name.description: User defined name for the standing order
